title: How to get S as Jungler?

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
I used to think that being a jungler was all about getting the highest kill participation in the game (I think foxdrop said that)
But I played this 17min (i think) game with Graves with the 2nd lowest kill participation and the lowest damage dealt to enemy champions.(even the support did more damage than I did). but somehow i still managed to get an S.(it was on EUW if that makes any diff)
So, if it isn't the damage dealt or Kill% then what defines a good jungler?
![](https://imgur.com/a/haVAH)

replies.body:
The main thing to remember about mastery scores is this: they are a grade on how well you did **compared to others playing the same champion in the same role**. 

Playing Jungle Graves for example would be graded differently than ADC Graves. Also, there's not a flat or even range of numbers you need for KDA/CS/Vision, but rather you need to be in the top percentage. These grades are essentially a placement of where you ranked among other playing the same thing.
